programme.title: Shining SOLO
programme.desc: The final day of selecting the ultimate Mr. TREASURE of Shining Solo PART 2. After the last one-on-one conversations to deepen their understanding of each other the women's deliberations become more profound... Who will be the final Mr. TREASURE of PART 2? The eagerly awaited final results are revealed.

programme.sub-title: YG MV Special - Performance Clip Part.2
programme.desc: A uniquely curated playlist features an unrivaled blend of original performance videos of the K-Pop artists (BLACKPINK, WINNER, AKMU, iKON, TREASURE, and more) from YG Entertainment

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: The members participate in the Game of Balance, answering questions to choose between two extreme alternatives. His answers are compared with those given by his fans, which were received via the internet previously.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: In a classroom, the members played at re-creating their first day of school. With the participation of the South Korean comedian Jae-sung Hwang as a teacher, they had to choose the president of the course, Lisa is chosen, and they had to complete an eating test without the teacher discovering them, resulting in Jennie, the winner.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: On the second day, the members had a special class of activities, where the final winner will become the school's assistant principal. The first game consisted of dancing to a song and stopping as close to 15 seconds. The winner was Lisa. In the second game, they had to pass in relays, ping pong balls on spoons held by their mouths, one by one, where they achieved the goal of 3 balls in less than 90 seconds.

programme.title: 24/365 with BLACKPINK
programme.desc: Unreleased footage from the filming of the music video for their latest single "Lovesick Girls" was revealed. They are seen having fun on the set of a convenience store, Lisa trying to wreck a car with a baseball bat, Rosé trying to cry for a scene, Jennie driving a vehicle with the members on board, and Jisoo filming in a fake rain. at 7 a.m.

programme.title: W-LOG
programme.desc: W-LOG is a reality show featuring behind episodes WINNER’s performance tours in seven cities–Seattle, San Francisco, LA, Dallas, Chicago, Toronto, and NY–across North America. This show depicts everyday life in the form of Vlog (Video + Blog) by WINNER members.
